it.unimi.di.law.bubing.frontier

Class ParsingThread.FrontierEnqueuer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unimi.di.law.bubing.frontier.ParsingThread.FrontierEnqueuer
  • Enclosing class:
    ParsingThread

    protected static final class ParsingThread.FrontierEnqueuer
extends Object
    A small gadget used to insert links in the frontier. It should be initialized specifying the scheme and authority of the page being visited and the robot filter to be applied. Then, one or more URLs can be enqueued: the actual enqueuing takes place only if the URL passes both the schedule and the robots filter.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(byte[] schemeAuthority,
        char[][] robotsFilter)
        Initializes the enqueuer for parsing a page with a specific scheme+authority and robots filter.
        Parameters:
        schemeAuthority - the scheme+authority of the page to be parsed.
        robotsFilter - the robots filter of the (authority of the) page to be parsed.

      • enqueue

        public void enqueue(URI url)
        Enqueues the given URL, provided that it passes the schedule filter, its host is blacklisted. Moreover, if the scheme+authority is the same as the one of the page being parsed, we check that the URL respects the robots filter.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL to be enqueued.
